# options

XATTR_NOSECURITY: bypass security-checking.

## Fields

- **vp**: The vnode from which to remove extended attributes.
- **name**: Which attribute to delete.
- **ctx**: Context to authenticate for attribute delete request.

items.description: The vnode from which to remove extended attributes.
